title: National Parks of New York Harbor: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       There are many things to see and do within the National Parks of New York Harbor, from learning about American history to birdwatching. Visit the individual park pages to see what's offered and how to make the most of your visit.     AFRICAN BURIAL GROUND NATIONAL MONUMENT      » Plan Your Visit to African Burial Ground         CASTLE CLINTON NATIONAL MONUMENT      » Plan Your Visit to Castle Clinton         ELLIS ISLAND      » Plan Your Visit to Ellis Island         FEDERAL HALL NATIONAL MEMORIAL      » Plan Your Visit to Federal Hall         GATEWAY NATIONAL RECREATION AREA      » Plan Your Visit to Gateway         GENERAL GRANT NATIONAL MEMORIAL      » Plan Your Visit to General Grant         GOVERNORS ISLAND NATIONAL MONUMENT      » Plan Your Visit to Governors Island         HAMILTON GRANGE NATIONAL MEMORIAL      » Plan Your Visit to Hamilton Grange         ST. PAUL'S CHURCH NATIONAL HISTORIC SITE      » Plan Your Visit to St. Paul's Church         STATUE OF LIBERTY NATIONAL MONUMENT      » Plan Your Visit to Statue of Liberty         THEODORE ROOSEVELT BIRTHPLACE NATIONAL HISTORIC SITE      » Plan Your Visit to Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace
